items.title: Rethinking AI: DeepSeek’s playbook shakes up the high-spend, high-compute paradigm
items.description: DeepSeek's advancements were inevitable, but the company brought them forward a few years earlier than would have been possible otherwise.

items.title: Do reasoning models really “think” or not? Apple research sparks lively debate, response

items.title: The case for embedding audit trails in AI systems before scaling
items.description: With more AI applications and agents going into production, enterprises need robust and auditable AI pipelines more than ever.
